BoxLocalization.Label: Database
BoxLocalization.Hint: Defines data source and its parameters

Action.Name: ReloadRequest
Action.Label: Reload Request
Action.Hint: This will reload the structure and statisticts information about the database, data tables and columns.

Socket.Name: ProviderInvariantName
Socket.Label: Provider invariant name
Socket.Hint: The invariant name of data provider.

Socket.Name: ConnectionString
Socket.Label: Connection string
Socket.Hint: Provider specific connection string for data source that defines database to be analyzed.

Socket.Name: LastReloadRequest
Socket.Label: Last reload request
Socket.Hint: Last user request to the structure and statisticts information about the database, data tables and columns.

Socket.Name: AcceptableDataTableTypes
Socket.Label: Acceptable data table types
Socket.Hint: Database contains of many types of data tables. This property allows you to filter data tables by selected acceptable types.

Socket.Name: ConnectionTimeout
Socket.Label: Connection timeout
Socket.Hint: Time to wait while establishing a connection before terminating the attempt.

Socket.Name: DatabaseName
Socket.Label: Database`s name
Socket.Hint: The name of the database.

Socket.Name: DataSource
Socket.Label: Data souce
Socket.Hint: The server name or file name of the data source.

Socket.Name: Driver
Socket.Label: Driver
Socket.Hint: The name of the ODBC driver specified for the current connection.

Socket.Name: ServerVersion
Socket.Label: Version of server
Socket.Hint: The version of the server to which the client is connected.

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: DataMatrix
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: Data matrix @Name
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Creates box corresponding to the table @Name

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: AllDataMatrixes
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: All data matrixes in DB
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Creates boxes for all data matrixes in this databse.

BoxLocalization.Label: Data table
BoxLocalization.Hint: Defines data matrix and its parameters

Socket.Name: Database
Socket.Label: Database
Socket.Hint: Defines data source for the data matrix.

Socket.Name: Name
Socket.Label: Name
Socket.Hint: Name of the table. The name will enclosed in aphostrophes in SQL query.

Socket.Name: Type
Socket.Label: Type
Socket.Hint: Type of data table.

Socket.Name: Remarks
Socket.Label: Remarks
Socket.Hint: Remarks.

Socket.Name: PrimaryKeyColumns
Socket.Label: Primary key
Socket.Hint: List of columns that define the primary key of the table. The value is either a value of one column or CSV (comma separated values). It will be not enclosed in apostrophes.

Socket.Name: RecordsCount
Socket.Label: Records count
Socket.Hint: Number of rows in the table (pre-computed field).

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: DerivedColumn
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: Derived column
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Creates box of a new defived column

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: Column
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: Column @Name
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Creates box corresponding to the column @Name

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: AllColumns
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: All columns in data matrix
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Creates boxes for all columns inthis datamatrix.

BoxLocalization.Label: Column
BoxLocalization.Hint: Defines column of the table and its parameters

Socket.Name: DataTable
Socket.Label: Data table
Socket.Hint: Defines data matrix or Multi-column.

Socket.Name: SelectExpression
Socket.Label: Select expression
Socket.Hint: Name of column or SQL formula as select expression. The name of column will be enclosed by apostrophes in SQL queries, specified formul will not be enclosed in apostrophes in the SQL query.

Socket.Name: DataType
Socket.Label: Data type
Socket.Hint: Column data type.

Socket.Name: Cardinality
Socket.Label: Cardinality
Socket.Hint: You should specify the cardinality of the column values.

Socket.Name: ValueMin
Socket.Label: Minimum
Socket.Hint: Minimal value in the column.

Socket.Name: ValueMax
Socket.Label: Maximum
Socket.Hint: Maximal value in the column.

Socket.Name: ValueAverage
Socket.Label: Average
Socket.Hint: Average value in the column.

Socket.Name: ValueVariability
Socket.Label: Variability
Socket.Hint: Variability of values in the column.

Socket.Name: ValueStandardDeviation
Socket.Label: Standard deviation
Socket.Hint: Average deviation of values in the column.

Socket.Name: ValueDistincts
Socket.Label: Distinct values
Socket.Hint: Number of distinct values in the column.

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: EachValueOneCategoryAttribute
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: Each value one category attribute
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Each value of the column becomes one category

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: EquidistantIntervalsAttribute
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: Equidistant intervals attribute
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Intervals of the same length; parameters are starting value and length of intervals

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: EquifrequencyIntervalsAttribute
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: Equifrequency intervals attribute
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: There will be nearly the same number objects in each interval; parameter is number of intervals in which you want divide objects

BoxLocalization.Label: Each value one category
BoxLocalization.Hint: Each value of the column becomes one category

Socket.Name: Column
Socket.Label: Column
Socket.Hint: Defines column or derived column .

Socket.Name: NameInLiterals
Socket.Label: Name in literals
Socket.Hint: Alternative short name.

Socket.Name: CountOfCategories
Socket.Label: Count of categories
Socket.Hint: Category for missing values.

Socket.Name: XCategory
Socket.Label: X-Category
Socket.Hint: Category for missing values.

Socket.Name: IncludeNullCategory
Socket.Label: Include null Category
Socket.Hint: Category with null values.

Socket.Name: Domain
Socket.Label: Domain
Socket.Hint: Decide if whole domain of column will be categorized or only some subdomain.

Socket.Name: From
Socket.Label: From
Socket.Hint: Starting value

Socket.Name: To
Socket.Label: To
Socket.Hint: Ending value

Socket.Hint: You should specify the semantic of categories.

BoxLocalization.Label: Body Mass Index
BoxLocalization.Hint: BMI equals a person's weight in kilograms divided by height in meters squared. (BMI=kg/m^2).

Socket.Name: Height
Socket.Label: Height
Socket.Hint: Column where height of the person is specified.

Socket.Name: Weight
Socket.Label: Weight
Socket.Hint: Column where weight of the person is specified.

Socket.Name: HeightUnits
Socket.Label: Height units
Socket.Hint: Units of specified height column.

Socket.Name: WeightUnits
Socket.Label: Weight units
Socket.Hint: Units of specified weight column

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: Attribute
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: Attribute
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Categorizes the column thus creating new attribute box.

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: AtomSetting
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: Atom setting
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Creates a new coefficient setting box.

ModulesAskingForCreation.Name: CategorialPartialCedentSetting
ModulesAskingForCreation.Label: Categorial partial cedent setting
ModulesAskingForCreation.Hint: Creates a new categorial partial cedent box.

Socket.Name: BitStringGenerator
Socket.Label: Bit string provider
Socket.Hint: Box module providing bit strings i.e. bit string generator.

Socket.Name: Importance
Socket.Label: Importance
Socket.Hint: Importance of this subformula in final formula.

Socket.Name: Categories
Socket.Label: Categories
Socket.Hint: Names of categories which defines the fixed set in coeffient.

BoxLocalization.Hint: Allows to change logical sign of formula.

Socket.Hint: Importance of this subformula in final formula.

Socket.Name: SignType
Socket.Label: Sign Type
Socket.Hint: Type of sign.

BoxLocalization.Label: Class of Equivalence
BoxLocalization.Hint: Defines class of equivalence of subformulas in formula.

Socket.Name: BooleanAttributeSetting
Socket.Label: Boolean attribute setting
Socket.Hint: Box modules providing setting of (partial) boolean attribute which belongs to one class of equivalence i.e. there can not be more than one partial boolean attribute used in final formula.

Socket.Name: BooleanAttributeSetting
Socket.Label: Bit string provider
Socket.Hint: Box modules providing setting of (partial) boolean attribute.

Socket.Hint: Box modules providing specification of classes of equivalence of (partial) boolean attributes.

Socket.Hint: Importance of this subformula in final formula.
